assessment_item.subject: Microbiology
assessment_item.title: 7Q5QQGQ6 மின் விலகல் பண்புகளை அளிக்கும் _________ அவசியமாக இருக்க வேண்டும்.
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

மின் விலகல் பண்புகளை அளிக்கும் _________ அவசியமாக இருக்க வேண்டும்.

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

ஆக்சோகுரோம்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:1257"},{"text":"

குரோமோஃபோர்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1258"},{"text":"

பென்சீன் வளையம்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1268"},{"text":"

ஆக்சோகுரோம் மற்றும் குரோமோஃபோர்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1273"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":true,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"7Q5QQGQ6 மின் விலகல் பண்புகளை அளிக்கும் _________ அவசியமாக இருக்க வேண்டும்.","title":"7Q5QQGQ6 மின் விலகல் பண்புகளை அளிக்கும் _________ அவசியமாக இருக்க வேண்டும்.","board":"State (Tamil Nadu)","medium":"Tamil","gradeLevel":["Class 11"],"subject":"Microbiology","qlevel":"MEDIUM","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":true,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
